How to move the dynamogram
The mouse is required to manipulate proximity on the 3d projection cube (x, y, z axis on projection plane) or alternatively keys E, R, T on keyboard.

To access 5d on the penteract (v , w axis of the projection plane) use Q and W on keyboard or alternatively the 5D unfolding buttons on the screen for frame by frame.

Q,W, E, R, T can be activated simultaneously with the mouse movements.

Key 9 presents the 5d cube empty structure frame.

Key 0 presents the numeric sequence of images displayed in all 80 squares.

? Symbol on screen : Access a general intro and instructions.
= Symbol on screen : What is a dynamogram?
+ Symbol on screen : The Iconological machine.
* Symbol on screen : Chart of dimensional projection mechanics.
& Symbol on screen : The tensions lines on unit-multiplicity.
â€œ Symbol on screen : Series ok key concepts to the dynamogram.

There are 7 different proposed tension lines.

Orange 1 on screen : Political - state tension. from Laocoon to Leviathan. (Red - Orange images)
Orange 2 on screen: Ideology-identity tension. From the self to the collective. (Yellow - Sand color image)
Orange 3 on screen: System - Particle tension. From the unit to multiplicity. (Blue pale - Light green color images)
Orange 4 on screen: Specie - organism tension. From organism to Genus. (Dark Blue - Green image)
Orange 5 on screen: Generic - Anomaly tension. From the individual to the mass. (Ochre - Grey images)
Orange 6 on screen: God - Hell tension. From heaven to pandemonium. (Purple - White images)
Orange 7 on screen: Morphological key images. (Pink images)
Orange 8 on screen: Configuration fundamental vectors line.


There are 3 proposed reading paths of images (red stripe) from different lines of tension in specific chains of meaning or iconological migrations of forms.

Red A on screen : Cohesion : decentred / centred
Red B on screen : Will : diffused / concentrated
Red C on screen : Time : expanded / contracted
